H0.text: On which island is Mahon situated. Menorca

H1.text: On which island is Mahon situated. Sardinia

H2.text: On which island is Mahon situated. Corsica

H3.text: On which island is Mahon situated. Caixer

A4.text: Menorca's capital is Maó, situated on the island's eastern end

A5.text: Port Mahon (officially Maó in Catalan, Mahón in Spanish) – became the capital in 1722 during British rule due to its strategic natural harbour
